version_description:
Big news: Cross DJ is now an universal app. Get it only once and use it on all your iOS devices.
Besides, here's what's new: 

INTRODUCING COLORS
- Change the color of each deck. 
- 7 colors available: blue, orange, red, yellow, green, purple & pink.
- Change the color of each deck, separately - making up to 49 combinations. 
- To change the colors, go to Advanced settings and select the colors you want. 

NEW PORTRAIT VIEW
- Display a single player on the screen.
- From the turntables to the pads, everything is bigger so you get more control.

DESIGN & AUDIO IMPROVEMENTS
- Vinyls: choose between big & small covers.
- Small buttons are now easier to tap.
- Notification when a loop, an FX, a sample or an EQ is active. 
- Better overall audio performance.
- Optimizes battery life much more than before.
- Bug fix: full compatibility for devices running iOS 9.

Thanks for using Cross DJ! Please support us by rating our app :)

3.0.2
Bug fix: when you pressed sync with keylock mode on, the tracks were synced - from an audio standpoint. However, from a visual standpoint, the 2 waveforms weren't synced. This version fixes this bug

Thanks for using Cross DJ! Please support us by rating our app :)

3.0.3
- Graphic performance fix: sampler tab button not displaying properly on iPad
- Graphic performance fix: track names overlapping artists names in the music library
- Various performance enhancements

3.0.2
Bug fix: when you pressed sync with keylock mode on, the tracks were synced - from an audio standpoint. However, from a visual standpoint, the 2 waveforms weren't synced. This version fixes this bug.

- Ableton Link: jam in sync with other Link-compatible apps (Remixlive, another Cross DJ Pro, Ableton Live, etc.).
- Inter-App Audio (node) & Audiobus (input master): send Cross DJ Pro's audio to other compatible apps.
- Automatic switch to dual mode when midi controller is plugged. 
- Bug fixed: SoundCloud's explore menu. 

Enjoying Cross DJ Pro? Feel free to support us by rating the app or leaving a review.

- Ableton Link: jam in sync with other Link-compatible apps (Remixlive, another Cross DJ Pro, Ableton Live, etc.).
- Inter-App Audio (node) & Audiobus (input master): send Cross DJ Pro's audio to other compatible apps.
- Automatic switch to dual mode when midi controller is plugged. 
- Bug fixed: SoundCloud's explore menu. 

Enjoying Cross DJ Pro? Feel free to support us by rating the app or leaving a review.

Enjoying Cross DJ Pro? Feel free to support us by rating the app or leaving a review.

few tweaks and improvements in this new version:
- Fix SoundCloud playlist issue
- Improved and reworked stereo sound
- Fix Ableton Link sync issues

The issue with SoundCloud is now fixed! SoundCloud tracks can be played without any issue.
We also fixed the Record issue (on some device, the audio could be slow). 

Many thanks for your patience regarding those two problems

Many thanks for your patience regarding those two problems

This version adds full iOS 11 compatibility + Drag and Drop on iPad. 

Use Drag and Drop on iPad to move sound files between compatible apps : 
- Import tracks from Apple's Files app.
- Create a loop in Cross DJ and play it in our remix app Remixlive.* 

We hope that you will enjoy this new version! Feel free to leave a review to let us know what you think of it :)
In case of bugs or issues, please contact us at support@mixvibes.com so we can provide help. 

* Importing sound files in Remixlive is only available after unlocking the “Import/Export” In-App Purchase.

This version adds full iOS 11 compatibility + Drag and Drop on iPad.

- Fixes crash when sharing to SoundCloud.
- Fixes issue when streaming SoundCloud.
- Fixes Open in Files.
- Fixes swap locators on iPhone.
- Display imported files in the "Files" Collection Tab.
- Fixes several random crashes.

This version adds full iOS 11 compatibility + Drag and Drop on iPad. 

Corrections in version 3.3.3:
- Replace Apple Facebook/Twitter sharing by official implementations + add logout option in advanced settings.
- Fix potential crash in Files search.
- Fix potential crash while opening a recording.  
- Fix potential crash when displaying Soundcloud playlists. 
- Fix potential crash when app soundcard settings change (app in background, connect headset, use Audiobus...).

Use Drag and Drop on iPad to move sound files between compatible apps :

The best DJs deserve the best app! This is why we keep improving Cross DJ Pro for you to have the best experience when mixing your music.
This version contains a new "Auto Cue" feature that detects the different parts of your song and sets locators so you can "jump" easily within your song.

Keep sending us emails at support@mixvibes.com, your feedbacks are important to us! 
And if you like Cross DJ Pro make sure to rate it on the App Store ;)

*Add Auto Hot Cues feature
*UI modification in the collection: import files and navigate more easily  
*Stability improvements

Added streaming support for SoundCloud Go+

As a SoundCloud Go+ user, you can now access SoundCloud's extensive catalogue from within Cross DJ Pro.

SoundCloud is the world’s largest open audio platform, with over 200 million tracks by more than 20 million creators across the world. SoundCloud Go+ integration lets users mix tracks streamed directly from the music platform, enabling access to an ever-growing track collection, and tapping into the cutting-edge of mainstream and underground music.
